page.title: 06A DAY OUT
page.content: On Tuesday my mum, dad and two brothers and I went to a Safari park. First we saw some deer, some zebras and some elephants, some hippos asleep in the mud,then some lions and lionesses. One lioness ran in front of a car. Then we saw some monkeys carring their babies.One monkey jumped on a car and did a whoopsie on the car roof. Another monkey jumped on the front of our car and made a funny face at me .Then we had dinner .After we ate our pack lunch we went to the fun fair. First I went on a ghost train then I went on a cable car then I went on a peddle boat then I was going to go on a rainbow ride I was to small.So I went on a horse ride three times and got very dizzy. Then I got onto the steam train to see my mum and then went home.
